docs.lead_paragraph: Significant gaps in the F.B.I.’s database of criminal and mental health records allow thousands of people to buy firearms every year who should be barred from doing so.

headline.main: Gaps in F.B.I. Data Undercut Background Checks for Guns
headline.print_headline: Gaps in F.B.I. Data Undercut Background Checks for Guns

docs.abstract: Significant gaps in Federal Bureau of Investigation's database of criminal and mental health records allow thousands of people to buy firearms every year who should be barred from doing so; many states have not fully provided federal authorities with  records of people ruled mentally ill; while flaws do not appear to be factor in Newtown, Conn, massacre, they have been linked to other past mass shootings.
docs.snippet: Significant gaps in the F.B.I.’s database of criminal and mental health records allow thousands of people to buy firearms every year who should be barred from doing so.

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and CHARLIE SAVAGE

headline.main: UBS Settlement Minimizes Impact of Guilty Plea

docs.abstract: To settle a rate-rigging case, the Japanese securities subsidiary of UBS pleaded guilty to a charge of felony wire fraud as part of a settlement that was structured to keep the potential fallout from the plea to a minimum.
docs.snippet: To settle a rate-rigging case, the Japanese securities subsidiary of UBS pleaded guilty to a charge of felony wire fraud as part of a settlement that was structured to keep the potential fallout from the plea to a minimum.

headline.main: At Year's End, News of a Global Health Success

docs.abstract: The stunning drop in global child mortality is proof that poor countries are not doomed to eternal misery. Here's how it happened.
docs.snippet: The stunning drop in global child mortality is proof that poor countries are not doomed to eternal misery. Here's how it happened.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Leukemia and Lymphoma Society notes the major regulatory challenges ahead.
